title: Riot gifting gp skins?
body: I just logged in a few minutes ago and the screen faded then it said "captain gp unlock" from riot, what did I get this for though? is it for getting the 3rd bilgewater icon idk?

replies.body: two to three days gifting Captain Gangplank (need to have played him before 10th of August, his 'Captain Gangplank' skin is now 975 rp)
If you played gp at least once in any match made game during the bilgewater event and own the champion you get the skin that was his classic during the event
if you played him free, you get the skin when u buy him
I'm inclined to disagree. I've never played GP free and have owned him since before the event started but still received the skin.
riot said it on NA or something, go check if you want, think it was Ezreal, so go disagree to them

Just noticed that the Captain skin says 'unavailable' if you are looking from the champions tab, but in champ select its fine, 
was wondering what was going on as I played a game with the skin earlier
they still need to put it in the store for 975 rp
